sections.heading: 01|Uniform depository act definitions
sections.text: Effective:September 30, 2025Latest Legislation:House Bill 96 - 136th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFExcept as otherwise provided in sections135.14,135.143,135.181, and135.182of the Revised Code, as used in sections135.01to135.21of the Revised Code

sections.heading: and cash received as collateral for a securities lending agreement are not interim funds of the state
sections.text: The investment of cash collateral received pursuant to a securities lending agreement may be invested only in such instruments specified by the treasurer of state in accordance with a written inves
